lead_paragraph: Almost immediately after Mr. Trump was sworn in, Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s lawyer sought to use the president’s words and actions to halt the prosecution of his client.

headline.main: Bergdahl, Called ‘Dirty Rotten Traitor’ by Trump, Seeks End to Charges
headline.print_headline: Soldier Asks to Dismiss Charges of Desertion
